turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the one in Ward Theater.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a cold brew coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would you like it sweetened?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what milk options would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like cream please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would you like to use applepay or some other form of payment?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to use my Starbucks rewards redemption.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can help you with that, you currently have 1 free drink, would you like to use it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I would.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, would you like me to place the order now or at a future time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please place the order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, you're order will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
